com.prodp.apsim
Class APProcess

java.lang.Object
  com.prodp.apsim.APProcess
Direct Known Subclasses:
APClientProcess, APServerProcess
public class APProcess
extends java.lang.Object

Container for APSim game data. All the necessary data per game is in this class.

          Default constructor.

Constructor Detail

APProcess

public APProcess(java.lang.String worldPath)
Main constructor. Creates a new process, hence a new tab. Also links to a specific file path; it is "Untitled" if it is new, and specified after saving. Sets up and fills the multiple arrays associated with the process.

Parameters:
worldPath - the path of the file, or "Untitled[0..n]"

APProcess

public APProcess()
Default constructor. Not used often.

Method Detail

getRotateX

public double getRotateX()
Gets the Euler X-Rotation (unit: pi). Note: X rotation is around the Y-Axis.

Returns:
the rotation in units of pi

public javax.vecmath.Point3d getCurPos()
Gets the current position of the player; the player is represented by a point, not a rectangular area.

the position of the player

i - the ID

Gets the current brush radius.

setBrushSize

public void setBrushSize(int brushSize)
Sets the brush radius. Used when changing the brush radius (E, C).

Parameters:

isFrozen

public boolean isFrozen()
Gets if the game is frozen. Useful in taking screenshots. NOTE: freezing cannot be used in multiplayer games.

Returns:
the flag

setFrozen

public void setFrozen(boolean isFrozen)
Sets if the game is frozen. Frozen means that the blocks are frozen, it does not mean the person can move around. NOTE: freezing cannot be used in multiplayer games.

Parameters:
isFrozen - the frozen flag

getRecord

public APVideoRecorder getRecord()
Gets the APVideoRecorder associated with the process.

Returns:
the recorder

setRecord

public void setRecord(APVideoRecorder record)
Sets the APVideoRecorder for this process.

Parameters:
record - the new recorder

isBoxHidden

public boolean isBoxHidden()
Gets if the selection box is hidden. Useful in taking screenshots or recording video.

Returns:
if the box is hidden

setBoxHidden

public void setBoxHidden(boolean isBoxHidden)
Sets if the box is hidden.

Parameters:
isBoxHidden - the flag
